sentence.text: GRACILE syndrome is a rare autosomal recessive disease characterized by fetal growth retardation, Fanconi muscle organ development aminoaciduria, cholestasis, iron overload, profound lactic acidosis, and early death.

Mitochondrial disorders are an extremely heterogeneous group of diseases sharing, in common, the nucleosome disassembly that they all ultimately impair the function of the mitochondrial respiratory chain.
